favourite.article: Knowing our present situation, the chaotic environment..truly there is nothing and no one that we could trust on...Oh LORD!

Truly we are not he one who weave our own tapestry of our lives. in this saga of this wide world it is but right to put our everything including our trust to the Lord who brought us to that glorious destiny...

Sister Mercy, if you can still read this there is a LTM meeting at UAE, contact Bro. Albert [number witheld]. Amen, so don't struggle anymore the Lord knows the best plan for us, trust in Him and have faith. Amen.

Amen! In all things we need to put our trust in the Lord! Apart from Him we really can do nothing. Trust in the Lord always. The Lord has His testimony already in this place the church in Sharjah, UAE and Abu Dhabi. We pray that more seekers of the truth be recovered for God's economy...

I really love to hear and sing this song because it reminds me on how the Lord loves us so much! No matter if we are in our ups and downs, God never leave us! Apart from Him, we have nothing and we are nothing! That is why, in everything we do we need to trust the Lord! Amen!

I love this song very much because it always reminds me that I must give my full trust in Him in everything that I do and that I must acknowledge Him in all my ways. I pray that in God's way He will establish LTM here in U.A.E so that the seekers of Him have a place to enjoy His table. Lord, we do trust in You. Amen.
